metadataAttributes.Title: Renewable Energy Technology Fundamentals
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Renewable energy is one of the fastest growing industries on the planet, with billions of dollars invested each year to meet international energy sustainability goals. This course will provide you with a solid foundation for understanding and deploying important renewable energy technologies such as wind and solar.  In addition, you will come away with a good understanding of important energy storage technologies such as pumped hydro, batteries, and hydrogen.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Renewable Energy,Energy storage,Solar Energy,Wind Energy,Renewable Energy Techologies,
